attributes.action: Force Boris to resign and hold his government to account for their failings.
attributes.additional_details: They have failed and it's time for change now.
attributes.background: It is time for Boris and his cronies to go they have made mistake after mistake during the coronavirus pandemic the economy is on it's knees. And now we are going to leave the eu with no deal which we will be feeling the economic effects of for the next two decades due to their sheer incompetence.

rejection.details: We can't publish petitions about honours and appointments, including calling for people to resign or lose their jobs.
